jd: From: Roshan, Vyzeinc roshan@vyzeinc.com Reply to: roshan@vyzeinc.com Position Title: Senior Java Developer - Hybrid (F2F interview)Location: Indianapolis, IN (Local preferred) (F2F inrterview)Work Authorization: U.S. Citizens (USC), Green Card holders (GC) onlyAnticipated Start Date: 1-2 weeksDuration: 7-month contract with the possibility of extensionMode of Interview: Initial 30–45-minute phone screen followed by a required in-person technical interview.Work Schedule: Hybrid (3 days onsite, 2 days remote per week). This schedule is non-negotiable.Duties and Responsibilities:Onsite Requirement: Selected candidates must work onsite 3 days per week and remotely for 2 days. Candidates must understand this requirement and agree to it.Local Candidates Preferred: While local candidates are preferred, candidates from nearby states who are willing to relocate may be considered if no viable local candidates are available.Skills & Experience:SkillRequired/DesiredYears of ExperienceStrong record of architecture, design, and delivery across large-scale software systemsRequired5+Core Java and Java EE (Collections, Lambdas, Streams, Concurrency)Required10+Spring MVC Framework, Spring Core, Spring Security, Spring Data PersistenceRequired5+Migration of applications to AWS, improving scalability and performanceRequired2+Experience with IDEs like Eclipse, IDEA, or NetBeansRequired10+XML Documents, XML Schemas, JSON documentsRequired5+Design Patterns, Data Structures, Algorithms, JDBCRequired10+JavaScript frameworks (Vue.js/React/Angular), jQueryRequired5+CSS Frameworks like Bootstrap, Angular, etc.Required4+REST/SOAP API Clients and Web ServicesRequired5+Weblogic or similar app/web server administrationRequired2+Docker/Kubernetes for containerizationRequired2+Experience with AWS/Azure cloud servicesRequired2+Oracle PL/SQL and stored procedures developmentRequired2+Agile Scrum Development frameworkRequired5+Maven build toolsRequired2+Selenium automationHighly Desired2+Linux server configuration, Linux scriptingHighly Desired2+Web Application server-side configuration and deploymentHighly Desired2+Position Description:The Senior Java Developer will:Architect, design, and develop scalable architecture systems for Java-based applications.Build and maintain highly complex, high-volume, and scalable software on a Java/J2EE application stack.Ensure quality and consistency in the software architecture across systems and provide day-to-day technical guidance to the development teams.Collaborate with teams to define system, technical, and application architectures, ensuring cost-effectiveness and competitiveness.Research new technologies and development tools to stay current with emerging technology and industry standards.Education & Experience Requirements:Degree: 4-year applicable degree preferred.Experience: 10+ years of experience in designing, developing, implementing, and maintaining Java-based software and applications.
